testcase.name: Test Honeypod Controller Processor Test Should be able to create index mapping to Elastisearch
Test Honeypod Controller Processor Test Should be able to create 1 event to Elastisearch
Test Honeypod Controller Processor Test Should be able retrieve 1 alert from Elasticsearch(empty)
Test Honeypod Controller Processor Test Should be able to create 1 Honeypod event to Elastisearch
Test Honeypod Controller Processor Test should be able to retrieve Honeypod Event in Elasticsearch and find relevant pcap
Test Honeypod Controller Processor Test should be able to simulate a snort scan and find scan result
